text: Douglas Hoyos-Trauttmansdorff, born 8 September 1990 in Klagenfurt is an Austrian politician (NEOS), member of the National Council and president of JUNOS – Junge liberale NEOS. == Biography == Douglas Hoyos-Trauttmansdorff is a member of the Hoyos family. Since 2010 he has been studying economics at the Vienna University of Economics. In 2012, he was elected to the Federal Executive Board at the Federal Congress of the Young Liberals (JuLis, today: JUNOS) as Secretary General. He played a leading role in the integration of JuLis as the official youth party of the parliamentary party NEOS. Since 2014 he is president of JUNOS – Junge liberale NEOS.Douglas Hoyos-Trauttmansdorff at www.parlament.gv (ger) Before joining the National Council in 2017, he worked as a project manager at NEOS and a forestry company.NEOS, Douglas Hoyos, Biography (ger) ==References== == External links == * * NEOS, Douglas Hoyos, Biography * Douglas Hoyos at www.meineabgeordneten.at Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century Austrian politicians Category:Members of the National Council (Austria) Category:NEOS – The New Austria politicians
title: Douglas Hoyos-Trauttmansdorff
